iati-activity.title: Bosnia: Conflict Prevention Pool Policing Project
iati-activity.description: Supporting the Implementation of the BiH Community Based Policing (CBP) Strategy project represents the continuous effort of the UK Government to contribute to the prevention of conflict in BiH. It complements its earlier projects in supporting the implementation of the CBP in two pilot municipalities in BiH and the development of a country wide CBP strategy.
